## Bar Chart

Figure \@ref(fig:duke-school-bar).

```{r duke-school-bar, fig.cap='Total Duke Enrollment by School', out.width='90%', echo=FALSE}

ggplot(duke_enrollment_by_school %>% 
         mutate(School = 
                  School %>% as_factor() %>% fct_infreq() %>% fct_rev()), 
       aes(y=School)) +
  geom_bar()

```
